1370: Amisius was born in Lievevrouwe kerch in 1370.
Got married to Cecilia at age 25 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Cecilia, Ghoudekinen, at age 25.
1371: Had a daughter with Cecilia, Moerseil, at age 26.
1374: Had a daughter with Cecilia, Salome, at age 29.
1375: Lost daughter Salome when Salome was 2 years old.
1378: Had a daughter with Cecilia, Gerburgis, at age 33.
1379: Had a daughter with Cecilia, Reymodis, at age 34.
1380: Had a daughter with Cecilia, Siburgis, at age 35.
1381: Had a daughter with Cecilia, Segherarden, at age 36.
1384: Had a daughter with Cecilia, Soeten, at age 39.
1386: Lost daughter Moerseil when Moerseil was 16 years old.
